item.title: 印度撤换批评基金组织分析的国际货币基金组织（IMF）高级特使
item.description: 印度召回了驻国际货币基金组织的最高代表，他是印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪的前顾问，曾公开批评基金组织的分析。【原文：India recalled its top representative to the International Monetary Fund, a former adviser to Prime Minister Narendra Modi who publicly criticized the fund’s analysis.】

item.title: 亚洲财长呼吁在关税谈判中保持地区团结
item.description: 亚洲各国财长和央行行长呼吁团结一致，并重申他们对公平自由贸易的承诺。【原文：Asian finance ministers and central bankers called for unity and reaffirmed their commitment to fair and free trade amid rising protectionism that they said weighs on the global economy.】

item.title: 特朗普计划对电影征税。这将如何影响好莱坞
item.description:
虽然越来越多的电影和电视节目在国外制作，但美国娱乐业的出口额仍然是进口额的三倍。【原文：

While more movies and TV shows are being produced abroad, the US entertainment industry still exports three times as much as it imports. 

】

item.title: 尽管面临关税挑战，越南仍将增长目标保持在 8
item.description: 越南总理表示，尽管面临诸多挑战，越南今年的经济增长目标仍保持不变，因为美国关税威胁给出口商和企业带来了不确定性。【原文：Vietnam’s prime minister said the nation’s economic growth target remains unchanged this year despite the many challenges it faces, as the threat of US tariffs creates uncertainty for exporters and businesses.】

item.title: 全球投资者推动 GIFT Nifty 衍生品成交额创历史新高
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 港元连续第二日测试强势交易区间末端
item.description: 港元周一第二个交易日测试了其允许交易区间的强势一端，因为在美元普遍疲软的情况下，地区货币反弹。【原文：The Hong Kong dollar tested the strong end of its allowable trading band for a second session Monday, as regional currencies rally amid broad weakness in the greenback.】

item.title: 特朗普释放对华征税态度缓和信号，铁矿石走高
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示愿意在某个时候降低对中国的关税后，金融市场情绪高涨，铁矿石也随之上涨。【原文：Iron ore rose as sentiment across financial markets was boosted after US President Donald Trump said he was willing to lower tariffs on China at some point.】

item.title: 贸易协议有望达成刺激亚洲新兴货币反弹
item.description: 中美贸易紧张局势有望解冻，提振了市场情绪。【原文：The currencies of Taiwan and Malaysia led advances among Asian peers on Monday, with sentiment lifted by hopes of a thaw in Sino-US trade tensions.】

item.title: 台币再涨 4%，创 1988 年以来最大涨幅
item.description: 在与美国的贸易谈判持续进行之际，台币周一大涨 4.5%，达到两年多来的最高点。【原文：The Taiwan dollar jumped 4.5% on Monday to the highest in over two years, amid ongoing trade negotiations with the US.】

item.title: 本周美联储利率决议前，黄金止跌回升
item.description: 由于投资者在美联储本周的利率决议前考虑全球贸易和美国经济的不确定前景，黄金在今年首次连续一周下跌后走高。【原文：Gold advanced — after its first back-to-back weekly loss this year — as investors mulled an uncertain outlook for global trade and the US economy ahead of a Federal Reserve rate decision this week.】

item.title: 特朗普暗示部分贸易协议最快本周达成
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普暗示，他的政府最快可能在本周与一些国家达成贸易协议，这为寻求避免美国提高进口关税的贸易伙伴提供了宽松的前景。【原文：President Donald Trump suggested that his administration could strike trade deals with some countries as soon as this week, offering the prospect of relief for trading partners seeking to avoid higher US import duties.】

item.title: 台币对美元汇率大涨逾 2%，创两年新高
item.description: 台币延续了前一周的涨势，在周一交易的最初几分钟内大涨超过 2%。【原文：Taiwan’s dollar extended a rally from the previous week, surging more than 2% in the first minutes of trading Monday.】

item.title: 必和必拓合作伙伴称 Filo 铜矿发现为 30 年来最大发现
item.description: 必和必拓集团（BHP Group.【原文：BHP Group.’s joint-venture partner Lundin Mining Corp. declared that the companies’ Filo del Sol project in South America to be the largest discovery of copper in three decades, based on new drilling and analysis.】

item.title: 金田公司将收购黄金之路公司，交易估值 37 亿澳元
item.description: 金田有限公司（Gold Fields Ltd. ）将收购金路资源有限公司（Gold Road Resources Ltd. ），交易价值为 37 亿澳元（24 亿美元）。【原文：Gold Fields Ltd. will buy Gold Road Resources Ltd. in a transaction that values the smaller Australian miner at A$3.7 billion ($2.4 billion).】

item.title: 印尼今年将在美国关税谈判中两次降息
item.description: 印尼央行在连续三次会议上维持利率不变后，预计将恢复货币宽松政策，在关税上升和贸易政策不确定的背景下促进经济增长。【原文：Indonesia’s central bank is expected to resume monetary easing after holding its rate unchanged for three consecutive meetings, moving to bolster economic growth against the backdrop of rising tariffs and trade policy uncertainty.】

item.title: 阿尔巴内斯山体滑坡为修复澳大利亚经济提供了难得的机会
item.description: 澳大利亚总理安东尼-阿尔巴内塞在周六的大选中取得了历史性的胜利，震惊了澳大利亚。现在的问题是，他是否会利用这一授权来推行严厉的措施，彻底改革国家经济。【原文：Prime Minister Anthony Albanese shocked Australia by securing an historic win in Saturday’s election. Now the question is whether he’ll use that mandate to push through tough measures to overhaul the nation’s economy.】

item.title: 石油输出国组织（OPEC+）同意再次增加供应后，石油价格暴跌：市场综述
item.description: 欧佩克+上周末同意进一步增加产量，从而增加了全球供应量，石油在早盘交易中下跌。随着亚洲地区贸易紧张局势的缓解，亚洲市场开盘将谨慎向好。【原文：Oil slumped in early trading after OPEC+ agreed to a further surge in output over the weekend, bolstering global supplies. Asian markets are set for a cautiously positive open as trade tensions ease in the region.】

item.title: 分析师称大选结果公布后澳大利亚资产或将反弹
item.description: 澳大利亚总理安东尼-阿尔巴尼塞（Anthony Albanese）连任后，人们预期他的政策将保持连续性，因此澳大利亚的股票和货币可能会出现缓解性反弹。【原文：Australia’s shares and currency may post a relief rally on expectations of policy continuity under Prime Minister Anthony Albanese after his re-election for a second term.】

item.title: 欧佩克+供应激增威胁全球市场，石油价格下挫
item.description: 欧佩克+同意再次大幅增产，在需求受到贸易战拖累的情况下增加供应，石油因全球供应过剩的担忧而下跌。【原文：Oil buckled on concerns of a global glut after OPEC+ agreed to another bumper output increase, adding to supply at a time when demand is challenged by the drag from the trade war.】

item.title: 美元汇率下跌引发亚洲各国货币波动
item.description: 在美元疲软的推动下，亚洲货币正取得罕见的超高收益，并引发央行干预，以抑制过高的涨幅。【原文：Asian currencies turbocharged by dollar weakness are attaining rarely seen superlatives and triggering central bank intervention to curb excessive gains.】

item.title: 贸易担忧减退，期权交易商押注澳元跑赢基元
item.description: 投资者正在买入澳元货币期权，打赌随着全球贸易紧张局势的缓解，澳元的表现将优于新西兰元。【原文：Investors are buying currency options on the Australian dollar, wagering it will outperform its New Zealand counterpart as global trade tensions ease.】

item.title: 加藤称不会在贸易谈判中出售美国国债
item.description: 日本财务大臣加藤胜信（Katsunobu Kato）表示，他不会在与华盛顿的贸易谈判中利用出售日本持有的美国国债。【原文：Japan’s Finance Minister Katsunobu Kato said he won’t use the sale of the country’s US Treasury holdings in its trade negotiations with Washington.】

item.title: 亿万富翁和首席执行官齐聚洛杉矶，为米尔肯呐喊助威
item.description:
这座美国第二大城市首当其冲地受到气候、住房和政治挑战的影响，关税和驱逐出境可能带来更多痛苦。【原文：

The second-largest US city is bearing the brunt of climate, housing and political challenges, with tariffs and deportations threatening more pain.

】

item.title: 本周全球商品市场值得关注的五大图表
item.description: 油价处于 2021 年的水平。铜被大量运往美国，使得亚洲和伦敦的库存处于历史最低水平。此外，全球天气炎热干燥，这对美国农民来说是件好事，但对欧洲农民来说就不是那么回事了。【原文：Oil prices are at 2021 levels. Copper is rushing to the US, leaving Asian and London inventories at historically low levels. And, boy is it hot and dry around the world — which is good for US farmers but not so much for those in Europe.】

item.title: 精品咨询公司 Tidal Partners 聘请科技界资深人士 Bill Shope
item.description: 资深技术分析师和企业家比尔-肖普（Bill Shope）在高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Veteran technology analyst and entrepreneur Bill Shope is joining Tidal Partners after 18 years at banks including Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 巴菲特宣布 5,500,000% 的收益率告一段落，首席执行官们为他庆祝
item.description: 苹果公司的蒂姆-库克称他鼓舞人心。美国银行的布莱恩-莫伊尼汉（Brian Moynihan）赞扬了他对生活和商业的教诲。摩根大通的杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）说他是 "美国资本主义的一切优点"。【原文：Apple’s Tim Cook called him inspiring. Bank of America’s Brian Moynihan praised his lessons on life and business. JPMorgan’s Jamie Dimon said he’s “everything that is good about American capitalism.”】

item.title: 特朗普呼吁降息，债券交易员转向鲍威尔一边
item.description: 在周五早些时候公布 4 月份就业报告 15 分钟后，唐纳德-特朗普总统抓住就业增长出人意料地强劲这一契机，加大了对美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔的施压力度，称没有理由暂缓降息。【原文：Fifteen minutes after the April employment report hit early Friday, President Donald Trump seized on the surprisingly strong job growth to ratchet up his pressure on Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell, saying there was no reason to hold off on cutting interest rates.】

item.title: 马尔代夫计划投资 88 亿美元建设金融中心，卡塔尔王室提供支持
item.description: 马尔代夫政府表示，在该国寻求解决债务危机之际，它计划在总部位于迪拜的 MBS Global Investments 公司的支持下建立一个价值 88 亿美元的金融中心。【原文：The government of Maldives said it plans to build an $8.8 billion financial hub backed by Dubai-based MBS Global Investments as the country seeks to address a debt crisis.】

item.title: 贸易混乱是特朗普计划的一部分，是鲍威尔的噩梦
item.description: 最近，芝加哥地区零售商吉姆-图勒（Jim Tuchler）和美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）有很多共同点。【原文：Jim Tuchler, a Chicago-area retailer, and Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell have a lot in common these days.】

item.title: 巴菲特将巨额现金和诸多问题交给继任者
item.description: 沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）选择在第 60 次股东大会的最后一分钟宣布了一个期待已久的消息，而这个消息对于他的粉丝、他的大多数董事会成员甚至他的继任者来说，仍然是完全出乎意料的。【原文：Warren Buffett picked the final minute of his 60th shareholder meeting to drop a long-awaited announcement that was still completely surprising for his fans, most of his board and even his successor.】
